definition: payable by the recipient on delivery, major food fish of Arctic and cold-temperate waters, to harass with persistent criticism or carping
details:
adjective
- payable by the recipient on delivery
= synonyms: collect
noun
- major food fish of Arctic and cold-temperate waters
= synonyms: codfish
- lean white flesh of important North Atlantic food fish
= synonyms: codfish
- the vessel that contains the seeds of a plant (not the seeds themselves)
= synonyms: pod, seedcase
verb
- to harass with persistent criticism or carping
= synonyms: rally
- to fool or hoax
= example: to fool or hoax
= synonyms: gull
